h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Tiger’s Acolyte
content: When the Tiger’s Acolyte falls, he’ll drop a curious Key Item, the **Old-Rattle Drum** , as well as leaving behind the Tiger’s Acolyte Spirit to absorb. The child’s toy actually serves an important purpose to unlock another boss. You’ll need it to commune with a child’s spirit in various spots around the Yellow Wind Ridge, with the first being a short backtrack away.

When the Tiger’s Acolyte falls, he’ll drop a curious Key Item, the **Old-Rattle Drum** , as well as leaving behind the Tiger’s Acolyte Spirit to absorb. The child’s toy actually serves an important purpose to unlock another boss. You’ll need it to commune with a child’s spirit in various spots around the Yellow Wind Ridge, with the first being a short backtrack away.
